versions.description:
Patch release with critical bug fixes and performance improvements.

‚ú® Features:
- Added new OpenAI reasoning models with comprehensive test coverage.
- Introduced DataFrame output to Structured Output component with backward compatibility.
- Enhanced DataFrame Operations with 7 filter operators including contains, starts with, ends with.
- Integrated JigsawStack bundle with improved UI components.
- Added PowerShell curl tab support with OS selector functionality.
- Implemented dynamic theming for WatsonxAI icon with dark mode detection.

üîß Improvements:
- Enhanced MCP health checks with session connectivity validation and improved JSON recognition.
- Refactored authentication flow by removing unnecessary settings_service dependencies.
- Improved modal responsiveness and overflow handling across components.
- Updated API Access to show only authenticated code examples.
- Enhanced file component descriptions and download functionality with custom hooks.
- Standardized cache service type hints and error handling patterns.

üêõ Bug Fixes:
- Fixed edge clearing issues when switching outputs with same type but different names.
- Resolved file deletion problems by ensuring proper database commits.
- Fixed MCP server component cache miss handling gracefully.
- Corrected flow_id validation to prevent None value logging errors.
- Fixed scroll behavior in update components review dialog.
- Resolved EventLoopBlockError in CI preventing test failures.
- Fixed auto_login authentication checks and file path uniqueness.

üß∞ Chores:
- Updated package versions with post-release tags for consistency.
- Enabled CodeRabbit guidelines for improved code quality.
- Updated GitHub Actions workflows and dependency management.
- Removed CrewAI dependencies and added proper import guards.
- Improved regex patterns for PEP 440 version suffix support.
Minor release with bug fixes and improvements. Database path migration.

Major release with version bump to 1.5.0 and significant improvements.

‚ú® Features:
- Added new hooks and utilities for single and bulk file downloads.
- Integrated @tauri-apps/plugin-dialog for native dialogs.
- Introduced tray icon support with theme detection and manual update checks.
- Added new custom components for flexible UI (CustomMcpServerTab, CustomFetchErrorComponent, CustomUpdateAvailableDialog).
- Added support for local connection checks in Tauri Desktop scenarios.

üîß Improvements:
- Refactored modules for better maintainability and readability.
- Added dark mode support and improved styling.
- Standardized proxy targets and constants to port 7860.
- Improved Windows paths, environment setup, and file exports.

üêõ Bug Fixes:
- Fixed feature flags, environment checks, port conflicts, and redundant logs.
- Resolved path handling for virtual environments.

üß∞ Chores:
- Synced frontend/backend versions.
- Updated documentation, logs, and release modal.
- Cleaned up path management across platforms.

Patch release with frontend enhancements, new components, and improved system compatibility.

üöÄ Features:
- Added support for user dependency installation during setup.
- Introduced custom chat input and file input components for better UX and customization.
- Integrated new file upload hooks with improved error handling and progress tracking.

üß∞ Chores:
- Adjusted window size and centering behavior at startup for better multi-monitor experience.
- Lowered macOS minimumSystemVersion to 13.0 for wider compatibility.
- Synchronized versioning and metadata in Cargo.toml, manifest.json, and tauri.conf.json.

üíÖ Frontend Improvements:
- Refactored multiple components for better naming, semantics, and responsiveness.
- Added neon glow animation to update indicators.
- Improved layout responsiveness and UI consistency for mobile and desktop.

üìÑ Misc:
- Removed hardcoded versioning in `custom-get-app-latest-version.ts`.
- Improved loading screen structure and updated unused imports.

Patch release with frontend improvements, bug fixes, and versioning updates.

üõ†Ô∏è Improvements:
- Window resizing updated to 85% screen width without auto-centering to prevent jumping between monitors.
- Dark mode logic improved using useTheme hook for consistent body class behavior.
- Version numbers updated across configuration files (package.json, lib.rs, tauri configs) to follow semantic versioning with patch identifiers.
- New Makefile target `sync_frontend` added to streamline frontend sync for Langflow integration.

üêõ Bug Fixes:
- Prevented click event propagation in custom-langflow-counts.tsx to avoid unintended behavior.
